meanings: (뒤로 물러나다) step[walk, move] back, cringe, cower, back away
A cow catches a rat while stepping back

vlive.korean: 뒷걸음질 치게 되지!!? It makes you go backwards, right? 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] '그 사람' 부끄러워 않아요
vlive.english: It makes you go backwards, right?

vlive.korean: [뒷걸음질] 어우 노노노! Oh, no! No, no! 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [솔라] 고고베베(gogobebe) Making Film
코코야 왜 이렇게 뒷걸음질 치는 거야? Coco, why are you stepping back? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 흐허헣 영재
vlive.english: Coco, why are you stepping back?

vlive.korean: 다리를 뒤로 뒷걸음질로 이렇게 해주시고. Bounce back once, like this. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 바론의 쉬즈마인🕺 (HOW TO DANCE BaRon’s She’s mine)
[본능(적인) 뒷걸음질] 차가운 물 한번... [Instinctively steps back] I'll take the cold water... 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 김종민&유재환 아이들과 함께 아이스버킷 챌린지 동참 <우리 아빠가 생겼어요3> 9회
vlive.english: [Instinctively steps back] I'll take the cold water...

examples.korean: The horse backed away, its nostrils flaring with fear. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 말은 두려움에 코를 벌름거리며 뒷걸음질을 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The horse backed away, its nostrils flaring with fear. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He came close but she drew back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 가까이 다가왔지만 그녀는 뒷걸음질을 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He came close but she drew back. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He backed against the wall, terrified. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 겁에 질려 벽 쪽으로 뒷걸음질을 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He backed against the wall, terrified. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As the riot police approached the crowd backed off. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 폭동 진압 경찰이 다가오자 사람들이 뒷걸음질을 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As the riot police approached the crowd backed off. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The woman is backing up onto the porch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여자가 현관으로 뒷걸음질하고 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The woman is backing up onto the porch. Add to Wordbook
